Function reference

version 0.3.2.9004

All functions

allfiles

Load raw list of all files available to raadtools from the data repository.

amps_d1files

AMPS files

amps_metadata

AMPS GRIB file metadata

aurora

Aurora Australis voyage track

chlafiles

Chlorophyll-a

chla_johnsonfiles

Derived ocean colour files

chl.pal

Ocean colour colours for chlorophyll-a.

coastmap

Coast map

commonprojections

This is a list of often used projections, in PROJ.4

cpolarfiles

Circumpolar ROMS files.

currentsfiles

AVISO ocean currents files

derivaadcfiles

Load metadata and location of files of polar climatological and other summary environmental data

derivaadcproducts

List all derived data products available through <code>readderivaadc</code>

derivicefiles

Load metadata and location of files of derived sea ice data products.

distance_to_ice_edge distance_to_ice_edge distance_to_ice

Distance to a sea ice 'edge'.

extract extract,function,data.frame-method

extract

fasticefiles

fast ice files

frontsmap

Fronts map data for the Southern Ocean

ghrsstfiles

GHRSST L4 files

icefiles

Load metadata and location of files of sea ice data products.

imagemap

Maps of places

ocfiles

Load metadata and location of files of ocean colour data products.

prodfiles

Arrigo production files

raadtools raadtools-package

R tools for spatial data, extensions using raster to read and extract

rapid_responsefiles

Load metadata and location of files of Rapid Response imagery.

readamps_d1wind readamps_d1wind readamps

read AMPS data

readchl32

Read R32 VIIRS files

readchla_johnson

Read Johnson L3 bins

readchla

Read Chlorophyll-a for the Southern Ocean

readcurr

Read AVISO ocean current data

readderivaadc

Read data from polar climatological and other summary environmental data

readderivice

Read data from derived sea ice data products.

readfastice

Fast ice data

readfronts

Read data from the Sokolov/Rintoul Southern Ocean fronts analysis.

readghrsst

Read GHRSST

readice

Read data from sea ice data products.

readmld

Mixed Layer Depth

readprod

Arrigo production data

readrapid_response

MODIS Rapid Response images

readssh

read SSH/A

readsst

Read OISST sea surface temperature data

readtopo topofile readbathy readbathy topofile

Topography data

readwind

readwind

sshfiles

AVISO sea surface height / anomaly files

sstfiles

OISST sea surface temperature files

sst.pal

SST colours

timedateFrom

Stable conversion to POSIXct from character and Date

windfiles

Files containing NCEP2 wind vector data
